title: The Great Queen of Spoiling
detail_text: <:th_ch0202/>....Fwah!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Ah, did you wake up?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Wawaa, how long was Kasumin asleep for? Your lap pillow felt so good that Kasumin fell into a deep sleep, Emma-senpai~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>Maybe around 30 minutes? You don’t have to panic like that~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>T-, thank goodness. Kasumin thought Kasumin slept for about 6 hours.... Eh, aaah! Kasumin’s hair is all messy~. Uwaaah, don’t look at me, Emma-senpai~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>It’s alright, it’s alright. I’ll fix it for you, so turn to your back~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>Aau.... Please don’t look at me that much when Kasumin is weird like this....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I don’t think it’s weird, though. You’re always cute, Kasumi-chan<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0202/>E-, Emma-senpai.... I love you! Kasumin will make lots of bread rolls for you, okay, Emma-senpai, so please eat them all!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0208/>I’m so happy! I also love you and your bread rolls, Kasumi-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
